content.raw:
This branch is not building for me:

~~~
/home/louisep/gazebo_source/gazebo/plugins/ArduCopterPlugin.cc: In constructor ‘gazebo::ArduCopterPlugin::ArduCopterPlugin()’:
/home/louisep/gazebo_source/gazebo/plugins/ArduCopterPlugin.cc:250:32: error: ‘F_SETFD’ was not declared in this scope
   fcntl(this->dataPtr->handle, F_SETFD, FD_CLOEXEC);
                                ^
/home/louisep/gazebo_source/gazebo/plugins/ArduCopterPlugin.cc:250:41: error: ‘FD_CLOEXEC’ was not declared in this scope
   fcntl(this->dataPtr->handle, F_SETFD, FD_CLOEXEC);
                                         ^
/home/louisep/gazebo_source/gazebo/plugins/ArduCopterPlugin.cc:250:51: error: ‘fcntl’ was not declared in this scope
   fcntl(this->dataPtr->handle, F_SETFD, FD_CLOEXEC);
                                                   ^
/home/louisep/gazebo_source/gazebo/plugins/ArduCopterPlugin.cc:268:32: error: ‘F_SETFL’ was not declared in this scope
   fcntl(this->dataPtr->handle, F_SETFL,
                                ^
/home/louisep/gazebo_source/gazebo/plugins/ArduCopterPlugin.cc:269:36: error: ‘F_GETFL’ was not declared in this scope
       fcntl(this->dataPtr->handle, F_GETFL, 0) | O_NONBLOCK);
                                    ^
/home/louisep/gazebo_source/gazebo/plugins/ArduCopterPlugin.cc:269:50: error: ‘O_NONBLOCK’ was not declared in this scope
       fcntl(this->dataPtr->handle, F_GETFL, 0) | O_NONBLOCK);
~~~
